What can Mieke and I care about together?

I'd love to find something that we can care about together. Some ideas:

  • Our mutual thriving
  • Caring for a pet
    • Dog
    • Cat
  • Board games
  • Travelling the world
  • Building/maintaining a home
  • (Making the world better, eg. donating?)

It seems that I care mostly about intellectual pursuits (Value curiosity) and making the world a better place (§Nobility), whereas she wants to travel, hygge and figure out her own career.

So far, I see two paths:

  • Cultivate shared interests and/or
  • Caring about each other and the relationship is enough.

Cultivating shared interests means getting each other in on what we find fun. One example may be to game together, board games etc.
